summary: Pure Vanilla Save that skips the opening wagon ride and takes you to just before character Creation.
descriptionHtml: I've looked all over and have found multiple types of save files that all state that they're vanilla saves, and while they may be, I've found that when loading them the save count is upwards of 300 or so. So, I've gone through, removed every single mod of mine, even the DLC Hearthfire, Dragonborn and Dawnguard as well as the HighRes Texture Packs. The only esm's attached to this file are Skyrim.esm and Update.esm. This should allow far more people to use it right out of the gate, and if you're like me who gets annoyed by the save count being very large, Starts off as Save # 1
author: Geekcore84
